name: K9 Sport Sack Air 2 - Small, Light Grey - Ideal for Dogs with 13-16” Back Length - Durable, Breathable Backpack-Style Carrier - Perfect for Walks, Short Hikes & Public Transportation
short_description: BREATHABLE DOG CARRIER - The Air 2 is your go-to pack for everyday adventures. Extra large Macro-Mesh on each side keeps your pet cool by allowing for maximum air flow, while also ensuring high structural integrity.

FIND THE RIGHT SIZE - The Small is best for dogs with a length of 13-16” from collar to the base of the tail and a girth up to 27”. Typical dog breeds that will fit this size backpack include Jack Russell Terrier, Mini French Bulldog & Pomeranian.
SUPPORT & SAFETY - Our patented Angle-Base provides a supportive platform for your dog (and their tail), while the collar and harness security clips keep them safe & secure on every adventure.

NO FUSS, JUST FUNCTION - This backpack features side & back cinch straps, a fur flap to prevent your dog’s hair from getting stuck in the zipper, an adjustable collar enclosure, and adjustable, dual side pockets.

MADE TO LAST - The Air 2 is constructed with durable Cordura fabric and uses triple-reinforced stitching to ensure the longevity of seams on high-load areas. Enjoy it on walks, short hikes, and bike rides for years to come!

name: Pecute Cat Backpack Carrier, Large Space Cat Bubble Backpack, Breathable Cat Carrier, Shaded Dog Backpack Carrier, Ergonomic 3D Design for Travel, Hiking, Walk, Suitable for Shopping, Car, Vet, Gray
short_description: Pet mobile safe house: This cat bubble backpack is strong and wide, with durable fabric, large space and convenient storage. It can not only resist animal bites, but also prevent the cat backpack from collapsing and squeezing the pet. All zippers are equipped with locks,and built-in safety leash ensuring the safety of pets and preventing them from escaping, while also allowing owners to take their pets out with peace of mind.

Breathable cat backpack that can block UV rays: The large mesh on both sides of the cat carrier allows natural wind to pass through easily, making the air inside the backpack smooth and comfortable. Lowering the waterproof sunshade can block UV rays from directly entering the cat bag.

Comfortable Carrying Experience: There is no pulling feeling when carrying the cat, and you don’t need to bend down when carrying it. The one-piece EVA 3D ergonomic backplate fits the back and improves the breathability of the back.Made with high-quality materials, it has no pungent chemical odor. A good cat backpack not only serves pets, but also serves pet owners.

Thoughtful Features: Includes front and side storage pockets for carrying pet essentials, snacks, leashes, waste bags, or medical records. The pet backpack is foldable for easy storage—when folded, it becomes slim enough to fit into a drawer, saving space. Comfortable and soft padding brings a good outing experience for pets. The padding can be removed for machine washing easly.

Friendly Reminder: Pets weighing around 6.6-8.8lbs(3-4kg) will find it more comfortable. Before purchasing, please measure your pet's size.The dimensions of the dog backpack are:16.5"×12.6"×10.2" (42×32×26cm) . Suitable for cats under 13.2lbs(6KG); suitable for dogs under 11lbs(5KG) with a body length not exceeding 16.4"(40cm). Pets under 6.6lbs(3kg) will have plenty of room.

name: Lekebobor Cat Carrier Backpack, Expandable Pet Carrier with Sun Shade & Full Front Opening, Breathable Mesh Backpack for Small Dogs & Medium Cats Up to 18 Lbs, Foldable for Hiking, Camping (Grey)
short_description: MAXIMUM AIR CIRCULATION & MULTIPLE ENTRANCES: Mesh windows on 4 sides for optimal airflow, 4 entrances (sides, front, and back) allow your pet to enjoy the outside scenery and easy entry into the carrier, and 1 expandable soft mat to keep your pet comfy during the journey

EXPANDABLE & COLLAPSIBLE: This pet carrier backpack with an expandable back allows your pet to move around more comfortably and reduces the anxiety. And the carrier can collapse flat when not in use. Measures 13x9.8x16.5 inch, easily fits most small/medium-sized pets, weighing up to 18 lbs. Each airline sets their own specific requirements, so it is advised to check with your airline of choice

STURDY & SAFETY: Equipped with a durable rod on the top and both sides are fixed with frames to stabilize the structure, plus a firm bottom pad offers solid support for your pets. Also comes with a safety leash to prevent escape, this pet backpack carrier is sturdy and safe for your pets

COMFORT DESIGN: Made with quality and water repellent 300D Oxford fabric for long-lasting use. 2 side pockets to store pet supplies and a ROLLER BLIND can be pulled down to protect from the sun. The travel backpack carrier is portable for traveling, camping, hiking, biking, going to the vet, or walking in the park
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: All Lekebobor pet carriers are backed by a 30-180 day solution plan for quality-related issues, as well as friendly customer service

short_description: Dog Carrier Backpack Dimensions: Black Size M – 14.6" (L) * 8.3" (W) * 16.5" (H). The pet dog front carrier backpack is suitable for dogs weighing 4.5 to 8 lbs. Please refer to the SIZE CHART in Picture 2 before purchasing.

Secure Dog Front Carrier Backpack: The front of the dog carrier backpack features reflective strips, which improve visibility in low-light conditions, making you and your pet more easily seen. The small dog backpack also includes a built-in safety strap to prevent pets from escaping and ensure the safety of your dog or cat.

Comfortable and Adjustable Dog Front Backpack: The front of the dog carrier features a drawstring closure for easy access. The width can be adjusted to fit pets of different sizes, ensuring it's not too tight. The detachable flat bottom provides additional support, making it easier and more comfortable to carry your dog or cat.

Two Ways to Wear: The YUDODO dog backpack carrier can be worn on the front or back, depending on your preference. The thickened sponge padding helps reduce shoulder strain, and it is equipped with a waist belt and chest strap to prevent the backpack from slipping off. This makes it more convenient to carry your pet during outdoor activities, hiking, and traveling.

Ample Storage Space: Our front puppy backpack carrier has three pockets that can hold treats, poop bags, and toys. Suitable for Chihuahua, Yorkie, Maltese, Shih Tzu, Miniature Poodle, Dachshund, French Bulldog, Bichon Frise, Havanese, or Westie. Our front dog carrier allows you to go hands-free while comfortably carrying your furry friend to the grocery store, vet, subway, mall, or on daily walks and weekend adventures.

short_description: WALK-ON WITH HARNESS & STORAGE; The Walk-On is a lightweight, packable backpack dog carrier, with a compatible harness and storage bag made for small to medium sized dogs; We've created an all new dog walking/hiking experience for those looking for ONE product that allows you to WALK your dog, STORE your gear, and CARRY your dog

ROUND TALL FAT SMALL: We get it! Dogs come in all shapes and sizes, and not every pet travel bag fits the same; We have your dog covered! Our walk-on carrier is available in multiple sizes from X-Small to Large; We have a dog carrier bag that will fit almost any dog breed; View the product images to the left to find the right size for your dog! Please contact us and visit our website for more accurate sizing recommendations; We have other models available for larger dogs as well

CARRY OR WALK: We want to encourage a healthy and balanced lifestyle for all dogs; This product was created for dog owners who primarily walk their dog and also want the option to carry their dog if needed; The Walk-On is a short distance carrier and used for the end of walks or hikes, giving your dog a break while exercising or in case of an emergency situation

name: Pet Backpack Carrier for Small Dogs Medium Cats, Puppies,Breathable and Collapsible Design, Portable Travel Bag for Bearded Dragon,Rabbit Cage (Brown +Two-Shoulder, Small)
short_description: Space-Saving Foldable Carrier.This collapsible pet carrier (13.0×16.5×9 inches) offers ample room for various small pets including bearded dragons, guinea pigs, rabbits, and cats. When not needed, it compacts flat for convenient storage.

Expandable Design for Extra Comfort.This cat backpack carrier features a rear expandable compartment, providing your pet with additional room to relax and move comfortably during travel. Perfect for small，medium pets, it supports up to 14 lbs, making it ideal for medium-sized cats or small dogs.

Multi-Access & Ventilated Design.This pet backpack carrier features convenient side, and top entry points, allowing easy access for your furry friend. Strategically placed mesh ventilation panels promote airflow to keep the interior cool and comfortable, preventing overheating during travel.

2-in-1 Design: Handheld & Backpack.This pet carrier features a versatile dual-mode design for both handheld and backpack use. The padded shoulder straps evenly distribute weight for comfort, while the reinforced top handle allows quick carrying mode switches - making pet travel effortless and adaptable.

Practical & Travel-Friendly Design.This pet backpack features convenient side and front storage pockets to keep all your pet essentials organized. The built-in luggage strap allows secure attachment to suitcases for smooth transit. It also includes car seatbelt compatibility for safe vehicle travel with your furry companion.

Versatile for Any Adventure.This multi-functional cat backpack is ideal for diverse occasions - whether you're traveling, visiting the vet, going to grooming appointments, or enjoying outdoor picnics. No more leaving your furry friend behind! The carrier enables you to bond with your pet on-the-go while keeping them safe and comfortable.

name: Cat Backpack Carrier for Small Dogs and Cats Fit Up to 15 Lbs,Small Dog Backpack, Foldable with 3-Side Mesh Windows, Pet Carrier for Travel & Hiking Friendly，Gray
short_description: Breathable & Visible:This cat carrier backpack features three high-strength PVC mesh panels, ensuring optimal airflow so your pet can breathe fresh air and observe their surroundings during travel. This effectively reduces anxiety in enclosed spaces. With three access points—top and two side entries—you can easily comfort your pet or let them enter and exit freely.

Size Guide:Our pet backpack is optimized for lighter-weight, perfect for small dogs and cats up to 15-pounds.To ensure your pet's comfort, please measure their height (≤14.5 inches / 37 cm) and width (≤12 inches / 30 cm) before purchasing. The right size allows pets to curl up comfortably, while the backpack itself remains lightweight and space-efficient.

Ergonomic for You:This dog backpack carrier Includes padded, adjustable shoulder straps and a chest buckle to distribute weight evenly and eliminate back strain., it evenly distributes weight for more comfortable long-term wear. The straps require simple installation , allowing you to customize the fit to your body for maximum comfort. They can also be quickly detached when not in use.

Durable & Easy-Clean:Crafted from scratch-resistant, high-strength materials with anti-escape leash clips. The interior includes a fully removable soft cushion, making it easy to clean stains and pet hair and maintain hygiene. We recommend not leaving pets unattended in the backpack for extended periods .

Incredibly Portable:Designed to meet most airline cabin baggage regulations (please be sure to confirm with your airline in advance). It can be folded for compact storage, and includes a luggage strap to attach securely to your suitcase handle, making airport transit effortless. Two side storage pockets are also included for keeping tickets, treats, and other small items.

name: K9 Sport Sack Plus 2 - Adjustable, Backpack-Style Carrier with Multi-Functional Storage Pack, Thick Shoulder Straps & Padded Back Panel
short_description: BACKPACK DOG CARRIER - The Plus 2 is our most complete carrier for small to medium-sized dogs. The thick, padded shoulder straps and padded back panel allow for more weight, and provide extra comfort for you on longer, more strenuous adventures.

FIND THE RIGHT SIZE - The Small is best for dogs with a length of 13-16” from collar to the base of the tail, and a girth up to 27”. Typical dog breeds that will fit this size backpack include Jack Russell Terrier, Mini French Bulldog & Pomeranian.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL STORAGE - Plus 2 comes with a removable storage pack—great for gear, treats, or other necessities—plus two full-size water bottle holders made with elastic PowerMesh to accommodate even the largest sizes.

KEEP YOUR PUP COMFY - Our patented taper-fit design supports & stabilizes your dog to keep them comfy during their ride, while the patented upper arm holes allow their front legs to be free, and patented mesh panels deliver cooling airflow.

MADE TO LAST - With heavy-duty 600 lb. test webbing, triple-stitched seams, and bar tacks on high wear areas, the Plus 2 is built to carry more and go further. Enjoy it on adventures with your dog for years to come!
